channel.title: Need Help Setting Up A Website?
channel.description: I'm new to this I Need a website, i have vps and domain, i just do not know what to do please help me!

item.title: Need Help Setting Up A Website?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“hatem, post:8, topic:531096”]Guys , im helping him at skype;he bought a webhost, please stop giving advices.

he don’t need help from another.[/quote]

Anyone and everyone has the right to help him. Considering your grammar isn’t too well, how can we even be sure that you know what the hell you’re doing? People can give him suggestions, he doesn’t have to use them. Whether or not what you try to help him with works, he’ll always have the second option of someone from here who posted help.

@OP: As stated previously, hosting a website on your VPS would be just fine. But, for your scenario (not knowing how to set everything up) you’re better off purchasing a website host. If you want a good site for web hosting, I recommend http://www.arvixe.com/ very nice web hoster. If you insist on hosting your site from the VPS, you’ll need to install Apache, PHP, etc. For the easy route, just download and install XAMPP. Then, you’ll need to setup the nameservers. (Use Google for instructions.)

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Setting Up A Website?
